result.arabic_text: لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
result.translation: No vision can encompass Him[33], but He encompasses all vision, and He is the Most Subtle, the All-Aware.
result.footnotes: [33] The people of Paradise will be able to see Allah in the Hereafter. See 75:22-23.
